Reviews.Title: Pretty Cool!
Reviews.Author: Richelle Roach
Reviews.Content: This TV is really cool looking. I got it for my son for christmas and he really likes it. The picture is really good. The only thing Im not sure of is the sound it seems to have an echo or muffled.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the young at heart
Reviews.Author: Scott
Reviews.Content: I am not very familiar with Hannspree TV's, but the picture quality is good for the price and hook up is easy. The only thing I would recommend changing is speaker placement so the sound could be heard better. Fortunately you are able to connect speakers to a place on the back for better sound, so when there are lots of friends over and some are watching a movie and others are playing around we turn the speakers on. Looks great in a sports themed room. Young kids love it!

Reviews.Title: Excellent themed/shaped television
Reviews.Author: ddj
Reviews.Content: We purchased at Costco and were initially attracted to its unique shape/theme since it matched our son's bedroom theme of sports.  However, it is a great performing television overall, excellent color, large, easy to use front buttons and a fun theme also.  Now hooked up to an x-box for the boys to play in their media/play room.  An awesome purchase!  Totally love it!  Highly recommend

Reviews.Title: Great choice for a football fan!
Reviews.Author: MomB
Reviews.Content: I bought this product over two years ago for my grandson. Besides regular tv viewing, he likes to watch DVDsof movies, past wrestling matches and play some games he has for tv connection. Television is in his bedroomand used several times a week - I have watched television shows, DVDs, and some of his games he plays with him.The sound, viewing and general condition of item are as delightful as day I helped him set it up in his room.A teenager who appreciates sound and pictures of what he sees and hears shows me that I made an excellent choicebuying this television for him.

Reviews.Title: Worse TV and customer support ever!!!
Reviews.Author: RicknATL "RicknATL"
Reviews.Content: This TV is a piece of crap. I bought one for my son and when it failed after 4 months, I had to mail it to Hannspree (in CA) at my cost ($60).  After I got it back 3 weeks later, they hadn't fixed it. Thus I had to mail it to them a 2nd time (at their cost), 3 weeks or so later I got it back...guess what, IT STILL ISN"T FIXED!!. Avoid this TV and the manufacturer like the bubonic plague.

Reviews.Title: Amazing picture
Reviews.Author: Rhonda Myers
Reviews.Content: Got this for my son, and he loves it. The LED picture is amazing! I am so glad I found this, got the  Basketball one for my other son, and he is happy as well!!! Go Hannspree!

Reviews.Title: Christmas present for son
Reviews.Author: Nathailia
Reviews.Content: He loves it simply put; easy to setup and shows a really clear pictures. The football feels like the real thing!

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV, great picture!
Reviews.Author: John Pape
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my son's communion gift. Very cool, goes great in his 'Bears' room. Great HD picture that rivals my Sony, especially for a non major brand, but if you're not watching HD its just OK. Had some technical support issues at first but Hannspree took care of it by sending a new TV at no charge so I am overall pleased.

Reviews.Title: Grandson loves his football tv!! Definatly a 5 star, Great picture!!!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: DUELLA NIXON
Reviews.Content: This TV, surpassed my expectations, it is very well built, excellant picture, definately deserves a 5 star rating, made my Grandsons Christmas!!!!

ProductInfo.Features:
24-Inch LCD panel With a 1920 x 1080 Full HD resolution
True 16:9 aspect ratio View your movies as the director intended
Wide 160-degree vertical and 170-degree horizontal angles See a clear picture from anywhere in the room
Built-in digital tuner Watch digital broadcasts, including HDTV programs where available
High brightness of 250 cd/m2 and 5 ms response time Quick response time for a great picture
ProductInfo.Name: Hannspree ST24HMUB 24-Inch 60Hz LCD TV
